name: @discord-rag-bot/discord-bot
description: Discord Bot with AI Agent functionality

scripts.dev:integration:setup: echo '🗃️ 結合テスト用DBセットアップ...' && npm run test:integration:setup && echo '✅ DBセットアップ完了。npm run dev:integration でBot起動してください'
scripts.test:integration:setup: docker run -d --name test-postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=discord_rag_bot_test -e POSTGRES_USER=test -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=test -p 5433:5432 pgvector/pgvector:pg16 && sleep 5 && npm run test:integration:init-vector && npm run test:integration:migrate
scripts.test:integration:init-vector: docker exec test-postgres psql -U test -d discord_rag_bot_test -c 'CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS vector;'
scripts.test:integration:cleanup: docker stop test-postgres && docker rm test-postgres
